title: Allu Arjun arrest: Telangana congress president says law will take its course - Hindustan Times
summary:
Allu Arjun arrest: Telangana congress president says law will take its course

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

B Mahesh Kumar Goud, the Congress president in Telangana, commented on the arrest of popular Telugu actor Allu Arjun, stating that the legal process is being followed, and expressed that the party holds no ill will against film actors.

  • Goud stated that the cases against Arjun are legal and he has been granted bail.
  • He emphasized Congress's supportive stance towards cinema heroes, citing historical support for the Telugu film industry.
  • The arrest of Allu Arjun arose from an incident during the premiere of his film 'Pushpa 2' where a fan jostling led to a woman's death.
  • Goud criticized BJP leaders for politicizing the situation regarding the arrest.
  • He mentioned the need for lawful action against BRS leader K T Rama Rao if irregularities are found in connection to a past race event in Hyderabad.
"The cases filed against Arjun are within the purview of law and the court granted him bail," said Goud.

This incident highlights the intersection of celebrity culture and legal affairs, as political leaders navigate public sentiment and legal processes simultaneously.

title: Mohan Babu Says Anticipatory Bail NOT Rejected In Journalist Assault Case: 'False Propaganda' - News18
summary:
Mohan Babu Says Anticipatory Bail NOT Rejected In Journalist Assault Case: 'False Propaganda'

Publication Date: December 14, 2024

Source: News18

Veteran actor Mohan Babu has clarified that his anticipatory bail petition has not been rejected, countering false reports circulating in media.

  • Mohan Babu clarified via social media that his anticipatory bail has not been rejected.
  • He stated he is currently under medical care and requested accurate reporting from the media.
  • The statement follows reports claiming a rejection by the Telangana High Court regarding his bail plea related to an attack on a journalist.
  • Mohan Babu apologized for the incident, which he described as “unfortunate,” asserting he acted in self-defense against anti-social elements.
  • He expressed regret for the injury sustained by the journalist in the incident he described.
“False propaganda is being circulated! Anticipatory bail has NOT been rejected and currently, I am under medical care in my home. I request the media to get the facts right."

The actor's statement aims to clear misconceptions regarding his legal situation, emphasizing the need for factual reporting amid ongoing legal challenges.

title: 'Pushpa 2: The Rule' box office collection day 10: Allu Arjun's arrest refuses to slow down the film's re - TOI Etimes
Pushpa 2 Box Office: Allu Arjun film shatter records on Saturday, Eyes 200cr second weekend in India - PINKVILLA
summary:
Pushpa 2 Box Office: Allu Arjun film shatter records on Saturday, Eyes 200cr second weekend in India

Published on: Dec 14, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

The Second Saturday has significantly boosted Pushpa 2's position in its quest to break lifetime records, particularly that of Baahubali 2.

  • Pushpa 2 is projected to gross over Rs. 70 crore on its Second Saturday, surpassing Baahubali 2's record of Rs. 64.25 crore.
  • The film is now on track to achieve the highest second weekend collection ever, potentially earning around Rs. 200 crore.
  • Early estimates indicate an 80% growth in collections for the Hindi version compared to previous days.
  • Pushpa 2 has passed the Rs. 900 crore milestone, with a total gross of approximately Rs. 925 crore and aiming for Rs. 1000 crore soon.
"The trajectory is highly encouraging," indicating Pushpa 2's competitive race with Baahubali 2.

As Pushpa 2 continues to break records, it sets a promising pace for future milestones in the Indian box office landscape.

title: Srikanth Gives Leaks About 'Game Changer'.. - Greatandhra
summary:
Srikanth Gives Leaks About 'Game Changer'

Date & Source: Unknown Date, GreatAndhra

Introduction: Srikanth, who plays a key role in the upcoming film 'Game Changer', has shared some insights about the movie, generating excitement among fans.

  • Srikanth assures that 'Game Changer' will exceed all expectations with unexpected twists and turns.
  • The film is said to balance strong narratives with powerful elevations, making it appealing to audiences.
  • Srikanth clarifies that there will be no sequel to 'Game Changer' and attributes shooting delays to scheduling challenges with the star-studded cast.
  • The movie is set to release on January 10 as a Sankranthi treat, with Ram Charan's role as Appanna being a major highlight.
"Audiences today love stories that combine strong narratives with powerful elevations. While some films focus solely on elevations, this one perfectly balances both. Shankar’s recent films may not have been successful, but this will not disappoint," Srikanth said.

Conclusion: 'Game Changer' is anticipated to be a thrilling and well-balanced film, with Srikanth's leaks adding to the hype surrounding its release.

title: Saira Banu recalls Raj Kapoor kneeling before Dilip Kumar after their marriage, shares Dilip Kumar's emot - TOI Etimes
summary:
Saira Banu recalls Raj Kapoor kneeling before Dilip Kumar after their marriage, shares Dilip Kumar's emotional moment to Raj Kapoor's cardiac arrest

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

Veteran actress Saira Banu paid a heartfelt tribute to the legendary Raj Kapoor on his 100th birth anniversary, sharing an emotional video on Instagram that highlighted his cherished bond with her late husband, Dilip Kumar.

  • Saira shared a touching video showcasing jovial moments between Raj Kapoor and Dilip Kumar.
  • She emphasized their deep friendship, dispelling myths of professional rivalry.
  • Notable memories include Raj teasing Dilip about marriage and kneeling before him on his wedding day.
  • Saira recounted an emotional scene from Raj Kapoor's final days, where Dilip rushed back to see him after a cardiac arrest.
  • She concluded her tribute by reflecting on their profound connection and the essence of their friendship.
“They weren’t just legends. To each other, they were home—an anchor in turbulent waters, a source of strength in moments of weakness.” - Saira Banu

This tribute serves as a reminder of the deep bonds of friendship that transcend time and circumstance, celebrating the legacies of both iconic figures in Indian cinema.

title: Report: Mrunal Thakur and this Bollywood couple likely to be part of Spirit - 123telugu
summary:
Report: Mrunal Thakur and this Bollywood couple likely to be part of Spirit

Published on: Dec 14, 2024 7:11 pm IST

The upcoming Telugu film "Spirit," directed by Sandeep Reddy Vanga, might feature Mrunal Thakur in the lead role alongside renowned Bollywood couple Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan as antagonists.

  • "Spirit" marks the first collaboration between Prabhas and director Sandeep Reddy Vanga.
  • The film is currently in pre-production, with filming expected to start in early 2025.
  • Discussions are ongoing for Mrunal Thakur to play the female lead.
  • Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan are rumored to be in talks to portray the main antagonists in the film.
  • The genre of the film is a cop-action drama, aiming to redefine Indian cinema.
“The makers are going all out to rope in some of the best talents in the country. Sandeep Reddy Vanga initiated talks with the B-town couple Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan to play the antagonists.”

With high expectations surrounding this project, "Spirit" is poised to attract significant attention, showcasing an exciting blend of talent from different film industries.

title: Jr NTR shows solidarity with Allu Arjun over arrest for fan death during Pushpa 2 premiere - Hindustan Times
summary:
Jr NTR shows solidarity with Allu Arjun over arrest for fan death during Pushpa 2 premiere

Date: Dec 14, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Jr NTR, while filming in Mumbai, reached out to Allu Arjun following his release on interim bail concerning a tragic incident during the Pushpa 2 premiere, where a fan died due to asphyxiation.

  • Allu Arjun was arrested in connection with a fan's death at the Pushpa 2 premiere and was released on interim bail.
  • Numerous Tollywood celebrities, including Jr NTR and Vijay Deverakonda, showed support for Arjun after his return home.
  • The stampede occurred as Arjun visited Sandhya Theatre for the film's premiere, causing chaos among fans.
  • The police filed an FIR against Arjun and the theatre management, leading to his arrest.
"Tarak is out of town and busy shooting... He called Allu Arjun as soon as he could once he heard that he was back home." - Source close to Jr NTR

The incident highlights the intense fan fervor and the responsibilities of public figures in managing large crowds during events.

title: Mukesh Khanna ‘Refused’ To Sell Shaktimaan’s Rights To YRF; Says They Would’ve Turned It Into ‘Disco Drama’ - News18
summary:
Mukesh Khanna ‘Refused’ To Sell Shaktimaan’s Rights To YRF; Says They Would’ve Turned It Into ‘Disco Drama’

Publication Date: December 15, 2024, 00:42 IST

Source: News18

Mukesh Khanna, the iconic Shaktimaan actor, turned down an offer from Yash Raj Films to sell the rights of his character, stating he didn't want it to be turned into a 'disco drama'.

  • Mukesh Khanna claims he was contacted by Aditya Chopra's team about selling the rights ten years ago.
  • He refused the offer and instead presented a counter-offer, indicating his desire to retain control over the character.
  • Khanna expresses support for Allu Arjun as a potential Shaktimaan in a reboot but criticizes Ranveer Singh's suitability for the role.
  • Shaktimaan originally aired from 1997 to 2005 and remains a beloved figure in Hindi television.
“I told them, ‘Tell Aditya, whoever he is, if you want to make it, make it with me’. I didn’t want to give away the rights only for them to make a disco drama. I refused." - Mukesh Khanna

This reflection emphasizes Khanna's commitment to maintaining the integrity of the Shaktimaan character amidst potential commercialization by major film studios.

title: Anurag Kashyap and his ex-wife Aarti Bajaj perform rituals at daughter Aaliyah Kashyap’s wedding, says, ' - TOI Etimes
Samantha Ruth Prabhu is ‘not crying’ watching Allu Arjun's emotional reunion with wife Sneha Reddy and kids - Hindustan Times
summary:
Samantha Ruth Prabhu is ‘not crying’ watching Allu Arjun's emotional reunion with wife Sneha Reddy and kids

Published on: Dec 14, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Allu Arjun had an emotional reunion with his family after being released from jail on interim bail, following his arrest in connection to a tragedy at the premiere of his film, Pushpa 2: The Rule.

  • Allu Arjun was arrested due to a fan's death during a chaotic premiere event.
  • He returned home on Saturday morning to hugs from his family, including his wife and children.
  • Samantha Ruth Prabhu reacted to the moment on her Instagram, stating, "I am not crying, okay!"
  • Vignesh Shivan expressed condolences and praised Arjun’s maturity in handling the situation.
  • Other celebrities, including Varun Dhawan and Rashmika Mandanna, showed support for Arjun during this difficult time.
“Waited to only see this! Very very unfortunate to go through this @alluarjunonline sir, but the way he handled this was very mature and dignified.” - Vignesh Shivan

This incident has drawn significant attention from both fans and the media, highlighting the pressures faced by celebrities in the public eye.

title: Kangana Ranaut criticizes Bollywood for losing touch with reality: All they care about is going to the gy - TOI Etimes
Pushpa 2 (Hindi) Day 10 Box Office Trends: Allu Arjun starrer scores biggest second Saturday in history of Hindi Cinema - PINKVILLA
summary:
Pushpa 2 (Hindi) Day 10 Box Office Trends: Allu Arjun starrer scores biggest second Saturday in history of Hindi Cinema

Published on: Dec 14, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

The Allu Arjun-led Pushpa 2 has achieved a remarkable milestone, setting a record for the highest second Saturday box office collection in the history of Hindi Cinema.

  • The film is expected to earn Rs 41 to Rs 43 crore on its 10th day, raising the total to Rs 458 crore.
  • It surpasses the previous record held by Stree 2, which collected Rs 33 crore on its second Saturday.
  • Pushpa 2’s second weekend collection is projected to reach Rs 115 crore, the highest ever.
  • Allu Arjun is on track to join the Rs 500 crore club by the second Sunday.
  • The film is likely to become the third biggest Hindi feature film in 13 days, surpassing numerous blockbusters.
“Pushpa 2 has established Allu Arjun as one of the most popular faces in the Hindi markets.”

In conclusion, Pushpa 2's unprecedented box office success positions it as a formidable contender in Indian cinema, with Allu Arjun possibly becoming a leading crowd-puller in the Hindi film industry.

title: India's most successful star kid had 2 blockbusters at 25, was lauded at Cannes; not Ranbir Kapoor, Allu Arjun, Hrithik - Hindustan Times
summary:
India's most successful star kid had 2 blockbusters at 25, was lauded at Cannes; not Ranbir Kapoor, Allu Arjun, Hrithik

Date: Dec 14, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

This article highlights the legacy of Raj Kapoor, recognized as India's most successful star kid, who achieved remarkable milestones in his early career, including two all-time blockbusters by the age of 25.

  • Raj Kapoor was born on December 14, 1924, and is part of the influential Kapoor film family.
  • At 25, he delivered two highest-grossing films, "Barsaat" and "Andaz," and another blockbuster, "Awaara," before turning 30.
  • His films significantly contributed to box office collections in India and abroad, notably in the Soviet Union.
  • Raj Kapoor was a pioneer filmmaker who earned international acclaim at the Cannes Film Festival.
  • He influenced the style and essence of Bollywood cinema, establishing a legacy that many modern stars have yet to replicate.
“Raj Kapoor had three all-time grossers before he turned 30, and he was among the first Indian filmmakers to earn global acclaim.”

Raj Kapoor’s legacy in Indian cinema, characterized by his unique showmanship and blockbuster hits, solidifies his status as the most successful star kid, surpassing many contemporaries in terms of cultural impact and artistic achievement.

title: EXCLUSIVE: Kareena Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan and Mrunal Thakur in talks to join Prabhas in Sandeep Reddy Vanga’s Spirit; Shoot begins in 2025 - PINKVILLA
summary:
EXCLUSIVE: Kareena Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan and Mrunal Thakur in talks to join Prabhas in Sandeep Reddy Vanga’s Spirit; Shoot begins in 2025

Publication Date: December 14, 2024

Source: Pinkvilla

The article reveals that Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan are in negotiations to play significant roles, including negative characters, alongside Prabhas in the upcoming film "Spirit," directed by Sandeep Reddy Vanga, with production starting in 2025.

  • Mrunal Thakur is in advanced talks for the female lead role.
  • The film aims to change the perception of cop-based action thrillers in India.
  • Saif and Kareena will portray a couple with negative roles for the first time in their careers.
  • Shooting is planned to begin in the first quarter of 2025, with a release expected in 2026.
  • The film is described as one of the most ambitious projects for Vanga and features complex characters.
"Spirit is the most ambitious and awaited film of Indian Cinema, and the makers are going all out to have the best and most talented actors on board." - Source

This film marks a significant collaboration and is highly anticipated in the Indian cinema landscape, showcasing a fresh perspective on the cop drama genre.

title: Anurag Kashyap says 'ye bhi gayi' as he shares pics from daughter Aaliyah Kashyap's wedding with Shane Gregoire - Hindustan Times
summary:
Anurag Kashyap says 'ye bhi gayi' as he shares pics from daughter Aaliyah Kashyap's wedding with Shane Gregoire

Date: Dec 14, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Filmmaker Anurag Kashyap shared a series of photos from his daughter Aaliyah Kashyap's wedding to Shane Gregoire, highlighting moments spent with family during the special occasion.

  • Anurag Kashyap shared wedding photos on Instagram featuring Aaliyah and Shane.
  • The wedding included rituals performed by Anurag and his ex-wife Aarti Bajaj.
  • Prominent guests at the reception included celebrities like Shah Rukh Khan's daughter Suhana and actors Nawazuddin Siddiqui and Abhishek Bachchan.
  • Aaliyah and Shane got engaged in a private ceremony last year and announced their engagement on Instagram in May 2023.
"Ye bhi gayi (This one is also gone) .. @shanegregoire my Silly take care of her. And I will get back to my stubborn self."

Aaliyah and Shane's wedding marked a significant moment for Anurag, who expressed his emotions about the day's importance and shared a heartfelt message on social media. The event celebrated love and family, drawing attention from fans and followers alike.

Naga Chaitanya, Rana Daggubati, Vijay Deverakonda meet Pushpa 2 star Allu Arjun after his release from jail. Watch videos.

After his emotional release from jail, Allu Arjun received a warm welcome from his friends and family, including notable actors and the director of his film Pushpa 2.

title: Ranbir-Alia channel Raj Kapoor-core, Saif-Kareena bring Nawabi flair to greatest showman's centenary celebrations - Hindustan Times
summary:
Ranbir-Alia channel Raj Kapoor-core, Saif-Kareena bring Nawabi flair to greatest showman's centenary celebrations

Date: Dec 14, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The celebrations marking the centenary of Raj Kapoor brought together prominent members of the Kapoor family, showcasing stunning fashion and honoring the legacy of Indian cinema's greatest showman.

  • Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt opened the event at the Prime Minister's residence, inviting guests to a celebration in Mumbai.
  • Ranbir donned a midnight velveteen bandhgala, resembling Raj Kapoor, while Alia wore a vintage-inspired Sabyasachi saree.
  • Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan showcased their Nawabi heritage with elegant traditional attire.
  • Vicky Kaushal also captured attention with a sharp pinstriped suit, adding to the evening's fashion highlight.
  • Fashion trends of the night leaned heavily on retro styles, celebrating the iconic era of the 60s.
"Alia looked sophisticated-ly sultry while Saif and Kareena looked every bit the Nawab and Begum."

The night was a grand salute to the legacy of Raj Kapoor, as stars paid tribute through their attire, embodying the essence and glamour of Indian cinema’s rich history.

title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collections: Allu Arjun starrer holds well on second Friday, rises to 850cr in India - PINKVILLA
summary:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collections: Allu Arjun starrer holds well on second Friday, rises to 850cr in India

Publication Date: Dec 14, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Pushpa 2 has achieved impressive box office success, grossing a total of Rs. 853 crore in India, approaching the Rs. 1000 crore milestone.

  • On its second Friday, Pushpa 2 earned approximately Rs. 42.50 crore.
  • The film experienced minimal collection drops and even some growth in Telugu states from Thursday.
  • Pushpa 2’s second Friday gross is the second highest of all time, trailing only Baahubali 2.
  • The film has already surpassed Rs. 1000 crore worldwide as of Wednesday.
  • Territorial box office breakdown shows AP/TS leading with Rs. 234.50 crore, followed by the Hindi Belt at Rs. 485 crore.

“It was essential for it to hold well on the second Friday to hope for a strong second-week hold, and the film has done better than it probably needed to.”

Pushpa 2 is on course to challenge the box office record held by Baahubali 2 as it continues its successful run in theaters.

title: Neetu Kapoor remembers late husband Rishi Kapoor in emotional post during Raj Kapoor's 100th birth... - Moneycontrol
Suriya and Trisha’s characters in Suriya45 revealed - 123telugu
summary:
Suriya and Trisha’s characters in Suriya45 revealed

Published on: Dec 14, 2024 11:07 am IST

The makers of Suriya45 have announced that Trisha will play the female lead alongside Suriya, marking their first collaboration in 19 years. Both actors will portray lawyers in this upcoming rural entertainer directed by RJ Balaji.

  • Trisha returns to share screen space with Suriya after nearly two decades.
  • Suriya and Trisha will both be portraying lawyer characters in the film.
  • This marks Suriya's third portrayal of a lawyer in his last four films.
  • The film is produced by SR Prakash Babu and SR Prabhu under Dream Warrior Pictures.
  • Sai Abhyankar is the music composer for Suriya45.
“Suriya is donning the lawyer’s role for the third time in his last four movies.”

Suriya45 is generating excitement among fans as it promises to be a captivating rural entertainer. Further updates are anticipated as the film progresses toward its release.

title: Raj Kapoor birth centenary: Rekha blesses Amitabh Bachchan’s grandson Agastya, Saif Ali Khan admires Tiger Shroff’s biceps. Watch videos - The Indian Express
summary:
Raj Kapoor birth centenary: Rekha blesses Amitabh Bachchan’s grandson Agastya, Saif Ali Khan admires Tiger Shroff’s biceps. Watch videos

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

The Kapoor family celebrated the legendary Raj Kapoor’s 100th birth anniversary with a grand event in Mumbai, sharing heartwarming moments on social media.

  • The celebration included notable figures like Rekha, who blessed Agastya Nanda.
  • Saif Ali Khan admired Tiger Shroff’s biceps during the event.
  • Alia Bhatt directed guests to the screening of Raj Kapoor’s film "Awaara".
  • Many interactions took place, including Rekha engaging with Ranbir Kapoor and Agastya Nanda.
  • This centenary celebration features screenings of 10 iconic Raj Kapoor films across 40 cities.
“Which film is starting? Awaara! Who wants to go see Awaara? Please go.” - Alia Bhatt

The centenary celebrations are a tribute to Raj Kapoor's legacy, showcasing the joy and connections among the next generation of stars.

title: Raj Kapoor: Celebrating 100 years of the 'greatest showman of Indian cinema' - BBC.com
summary:
Raj Kapoor: Celebrating 100 years of the 'greatest showman of Indian cinema'

Publication Date: Not specified Source: BBC News

Raj Kapoor, fondly called the "greatest showman of Indian cinema", was a pioneering filmmaker, producer, and actor whose work continues to influence Indian films. Celebrations are taking place across the country to honor what would have been his 100th birthday.

  • Raj Kapoor remains a beloved figure in Indian cinema nearly four decades after his death in 1988.
  • His early films often had a socialistic theme, reflecting the country's aspirations post-independence.
  • A retrospective of 10 of his iconic films will be showcased in 40 cities and 135 cinemas across India.
  • Kapoor's notable films include Aag, Barsaat, Awara, Shree 420, and others, establishing RK Films as a major studio.
"Kapoor brought romance, sexuality, song and soul to Indian socialism." - Sunil Khilnani, historian

Raj Kapoor's legacy is celebrated as he profoundly influenced Indian cinema through his artistic vision and storytelling, impacting generations of filmmakers and audiences alike.

title: Mukesh Khanna wants Allu Arjun to play Shaktimaan; criticises Pushpa 2 The Rule: ‘Not committing to anything but…’ - Hindustan Times
summary:
Mukesh Khanna wants Allu Arjun to play Shaktimaan; criticises Pushpa 2 The Rule: ‘Not committing to anything but…’

Date: Dec 14, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Mukesh Khanna has expressed his preference for Allu Arjun to take on the role of Shaktimaan, while also critiquing the filmmaking choices in Pushpa 2: The Rule.

  • Khanna is open to Allu Arjun portraying Shaktimaan after seeing his performance in Pushpa 2.
  • He stated he is not making commitments but believes Arjun has the looks and stature suitable for the superhero role.
  • Khanna praised Pushpa 2 for its craftsmanship but criticized it for glamorizing illegal activities like red sanders smuggling.
  • He urged Bollywood to learn from South Indian filmmakers regarding budget allocation and remuneration strategies.
  • Pushpa 2 crossed ₹1000 crore gross globally within a week of its release.
“I am not committing to anything, but I think he (Arjun) can be Shaktimaan. He has good looks and height.” - Mukesh Khanna

In conclusion, Mukesh Khanna's endorsement of Allu Arjun for Shaktimaan, coupled with his critical perspective on current trends in Bollywood, highlights the ongoing dialogue about filmmaking ethics and actor remuneration in the industry.
